Class ec.e.hab.HaberdasheryObject 

java.lang.Object
   |
   +----ec.e.hab.HaberdasheryObject
public class HaberdasheryObject
extends Object
Abstract base class for all objects that are to be stored by the Haberdashery.

HaberdasheryObject()
Since this is an abstract class, this constructor should never be called directly.

designators()
Enumerate the Designators which this HaberdasheryObject contains.
isDetermined()
Test if this HaberdasheryObject is determined.
isFullyDetermined(Repository, Unit)
Test if this HaberdasheryObject is fully determined.
isFullySpecified(Repository, Unit)
Test if this HaberdasheryObject is fully specified.
isSpecified()
Test if this HaberdasheryObject is specified

HaberdasheryObject 
  protected HaberdasheryObject()
Since this is an abstract class, this constructor should never be called directly.

designators 
  public Enumeration designators()
Enumerate the Designators which this HaberdasheryObject contains. All HaberdasheryObjects are expected to be able to do this, so that methods can walk the reference graph. Default is that object contains no Designators.
isDetermined 
  public boolean isDetermined()
Test if this HaberdasheryObject is determined.
Returns:
true iff the HaberdasheryObject is determined.
isSpecified 
  public boolean isSpecified()
Test if this HaberdasheryObject is specified
Returns:
true iff the HaberdasheryObject is specified.
isFullyDetermined 
  public boolean isFullyDetermined(Repository rep,
                                   Unit rootUnit)
Test if this HaberdasheryObject is fully determined.
Returns:
true iff the HaberdasheryObject is fully determined.
isFullySpecified 
  public boolean isFullySpecified(Repository rep,
                                  Unit rootUnit)
Test if this HaberdasheryObject is fully specified.
Returns:
true iff the HaberdasheryObject is fully specified.
